name: dark theme
description: **“Create a premium dark-theme Shopify fashion brand template with a full 000-black background, matte textures, soft gradients, neon accent highlights (gold/red/purple/blue), floating glass UI panels (10–20% opacity), cinematic shadows, high-fashion editorial typography (serif headers + geometric sans body text), and dramatic runway-style visuals.
